required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of Multivalent Pneumococcal Vaccines in Japanese Adults 18 to 49 Years of Age
clinical_study.official_title: A PHASE 1B, RANDOMIZED, CONTROLLED, DOUBLE-BLIND TRIAL TO EVALUATE THE SAFETY AND IMMUNOGENICITY OF MULTIVALENT PNEUMOCOCCAL CONJUGATE VACCINES IN HEALTHY JAPANESE ADULTS 18 TO 49 YEARS OF AGE

brief_summary.textblock: This Phase 1b will describe the safety and immunogenicity of 2 multivalent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine formulations in healthy Japanese adults in the United States.

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects reporting prompted local reactions within 14 days after vaccination (redness, swelling, and pain at the injection site).
primary_outcome.description: Subjects reporting prompted local reactions within 14 days after vaccination (redness, swelling, and pain at the injection site).

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects reporting prompted systemic events within 14 days after vaccination (fever, headache, fatigue, muscle pain, and joint pain).
primary_outcome.description: Subjects reporting prompted systemic events within 14 days after vaccination (fever, headache, fatigue, muscle pain, and joint pain).

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects reporting adverse events (AEs) within 1 month after vaccination.
primary_outcome.description: Subjects reporting adverse events (AEs) within 1 month after vaccination.

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects reporting serious adverse events (SAEs) within 6 months after vaccination.
primary_outcome.description: Subjects reporting serious adverse events (SAEs) within 6 months after vaccination.

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects reporting newly diagnosed chronic medical conditions (NDCMCs) within 6 months after vaccination.
primary_outcome.description: Subjects reporting newly diagnosed chronic medical conditions (NDCMCs) within 6 months after vaccination.

secondary_outcome.description: Pneumococcal serotype-specific OPA titers 1 month after vaccination.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female Japanese subjects 18 to 49 years of age, defined as Japanese born in Japan, with both parents and 4 grandparents who wer born in Japan (family tree by history), and who have not lived outside of Japan for more than 5 years total (confirmed by passport or interview)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in other studies involving investigational drug(s), investigational vaccines, or investigational medical devised within 28 days prior to study entry and/or during study participation. Participation in purely observational studies is acceptable.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
